import React from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { BarChart3, Workflow, GitBranch } from 'lucide-react'; export default function Navigation() { const location = useLocation(); const isWorkflow = location.pathname === '/'; const isComprehensive = location.pathname === '/comprehensive'; const isMetrics = location.pathname.startsWith('/metrics'); return (
WKI Service Management
The Worlds Best!
Workflow Detailed Metrics
); }
